com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.decode

类 BaseImageDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nostra13.universalimageloader.core.decode.BaseImageDecoder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ImageDecoder

    public class BaseImageDecoder
extends Object
implements ImageDecoder
    Decodes images to Bitmap, scales them to needed size
    从以下版本开始:
    1.8.3
    另请参阅:
    ImageDecodingInfo

        public BaseImageDecoder(boolean loggingEnabled)
        参数:
        loggingEnabled - Whether debug logs will be written to LogCat. Usually should match ImageLoaderConfiguration.writeDebugLogs()

    • 方法详细资料

      • decode

        public android.graphics.Bitmap decode(ImageDecodingInfo decodingInfo)
                               throws IOException
        Decodes image from URI into Bitmap. Image is scaled close to incoming target size during decoding (depend on incoming parameters).
        指定者:
        decode 在接口中 ImageDecoder
        参数:
        decodingInfo - Needed data for decoding image
        返回:
        Decoded bitmap
        抛出:
        IOException - if some I/O exception occurs during image reading
        UnsupportedOperationException - if image URI has unsupported scheme(protocol)

      • getImageStream

        protected InputStream getImageStream(ImageDecodingInfo decodingInfo)
                              throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
